CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Configure Teams meetings with protection for sensitive data on a mobile device
CurrentVersion.description: Users can collaborate in a way that meets compliance standards in meetings on a mobile device by picking sensitivity labels on Teams calendar. The labels will follow all the rules that have been set by the administrators, and they will apply to the users in the tenant.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Configure Teams meetings with protection for sensitive data on a mobile device
OldVersion.description: Users can collaborate in a way that meets compliance standards in meetings on a mobile device by picking sensitivity labels on Teams calendar. The labels will follow all the rules that have been set by the administrators, and they will apply to the users in the tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Analytics for multiple Connections experiences
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, customers using multiple Viva Connections experiences in their tenants will see analytics aggregated at each experience level. There will be no change in how the analytics module is accessed or any metrics provided.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Analytics for multiple Connections experiences
OldVersion.description: With this feature, customers using multiple Viva Connections experiences in their tenants will see analytics aggregated at each experience level. There will be no change in how the analytics module is accessed or any metrics provided.

CurrentVersion.title: Minecraft Education: Minecraft Education Summer Release
CurrentVersion.description: ,The next major update for Minecraft Education will include support for preview applications which can be installed side-by-side with the main Minecraft Education application. This update will add OneDrive-based cloud world storage for backup of worlds. It will also include the major features from Minecraft 1.21 such as trial chambers, breezes, and armadillos.  More features will be announced soon!

OldVersion.title: Minecraft Education: Minecraft Education Summer Release
OldVersion.description: ,The next major update for Minecraft Education will include support for preview applications which can be installed side-by-side with the main Minecraft Education application. This update will add OneDrive-based cloud world storage for backup of worlds. It will also include the major features from Minecraft 1.21 such as trial chambers, breezes, and armadillos.  More features will be announced soon!

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Users will now be notified when their admin unblocks a requested app
CurrentVersion.description: Users on teams will be notified when their IT Admin unblocks an app that was previously requested by the user.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in webinars
OldVersion.description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Sensitive information processing model
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Premium users will now have the capability to apply a prebuilt sensitive information processing model to SharePoint libraries. This model is designed to detect and possibly extract sensitive information from documents upon their library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Loop available in Loop components in Teams and Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: People with a Copilot License can now leverage Copilot in Loop when they paste Loop components into the Teams app, Outlook, and Meeting Notes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.
